name: KHO International Trade Consulting, LLC
overview:
Over 20 years • Strategic Project Management • International Market Research • Regulatory Compliance Support • Professional Language Translations

• Strategic Product Development Support • Problem solving • Product and Formulation Changes • Multi-cultural settings • Projects in multiple countries

Localization • Product and language adaptation to local market needs and regulations • Material Safety Data Sheets, Safety Data Sheets • Technical Data Sheets • Labels • Web sites • Product descriptions

Professional handling of confidential information. Legal (depositions, legal briefs, trial preprations, court appearance), Technical (engineering, chemical, biotechnology, IT / computer), Business (contracts, memos, letters), Regulatory Compliance / Localization (identification of verbal regulatory requirements, cooperation with technical and IT teams to develop market specific technical, web based and regulatory compliant documents)
